description:
Maintenance of residential buildings

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
61261 Price indices for the construction industry

Definition:
Measure of the average movement of construction operation
prices in the maintenance of buildings.

The construction operations covered are those which have to
be performed during a building's useful life to ensure that
it can be used according to purpose, to properly remedy
structural and other defects due to use, ageing and weather
exposure.

"Decorative repairs" are shown separately under maintenance.
They include papering or painting walls and ceilings,
painting floors and radiators including pipework, interior
doors, and the interior sides of windows and exterior doors.
